channel.title: Tutisland
channel.description:
hey on tut island you cant talk, well u can but no1 else can see you talking. is there a way to make it so people can see you talking?
or is it something to do with the client?

item.title: Tutisland
item.dc:creator: @mrx229 mrx229
item.description:
@mrx229 wrote:

o well it worked for my server…

umm hold on, ill look how its done on my other server

well on my other server it says pritty much the same thing except the random thing is differnt
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) {
if (misc.random2(22) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “HO HO HO! MERRY CHRISTMAS”;
}
}
